DOC.detailed_description: Increased saturate fat intake know elevate plasma level low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) high-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( HDL-C ) , however , less know regard effect saturate fat lipoprotein subclass . We previously show , context reduce carbohydrate diet , saturate fat induced increase LDL cholesterol apparently due increase large , buoyant LDL without increase small , dense LDL . This finding support previous dietary intervention study show correlation saturate fat intake large LDL . In case , increase large LDL correlate increase large HDL . In study , test follow specific hypothesis regard change plasma lipoprotein induce diet high myristic acid saturate fat derive primarily dairy source individual LDL subclass pattern B : 1 ) coordinate increase level large HDL particle consider anti-atherogenic large LDL particle less strongly associate increase CVD risk small LDL ; 2 ) change lipoprotein profile result high proportion pattern B individual convert LDL subclass pattern A ( predominance large LDL ) ; 3 ) coordinate increase large HDL LDL due common underlie pathway . The latter hypothesis address assay cholesterol ester transfer protein ( CETP ) , hepatic lipase ( HL ) , lipoprotein lipase ( LPL ) .
DOC.criteria: Men postmenopausal woman 1870 yr Body Mass Index 2535 Blood pressure < 150/90 Non smoking Agrees consume alcohol dietary supplement study LDL Subclass Pattern B Total cholesterol LDLC ≤95th percentile sex age Fasting triglycerides ≤ 500mg/dl Fasting blood sugar < 126 mg/dl At least 3 month weight stable History coronary heart disease , cerebrovascular disease , peripheral vascular disease , bleed disorder , liver renal disease , diabetes , lung disease , HIV , cancer ( skin ) last 5 year Taking drug know affect lipid metabolism hormone Abnormal thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH )
